trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Granbury
There were no other sightings in Granbury on or around January 8th 2008
Summary: large, low flying, two blinking red lights, quiet, slow, two jet at the rear or turbinds,
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my car to take back some DVD rentals, Around 0900 pm on Jan 8 2008. Heading southeast to Acton Tx. The blimp size craft fist came from over my left shoulder.I was at a the stop sign on Hideaway bay and Meander. I watched it and thought that it was too low for a commercial airline. So I thought it was Military and it was going to land in Fort Worth. The large craft was not to loud maybe a hum like a generator. It looked like there was to jets following it on both sides at the rear.I can not recall how may lights, but I belive there were a red lights rear and front. Not too bright but blinking. Then when I was on FM hwy 4 it was in front of me. Now the the jets that look like it was following the Large plane (about the size of a military bommer,I think from pictures I have seen ),look more like big turbines(jet engines) you see on planes. Only one on each side but large. It moved slow,low and steady , heading southeast from Granbury, TX. I just lost interest. Did not think anything about it. Till I heard there were other sightings. And the Military denies any activity that night. Please let me Know if there is an explaination to this.
